name: website
desc: The ticket marks issues with the offical website wpn-xm.org.

name: server control panel
desc: The ticket marks issues with the bundled Server Control Panel.

name: webinterface
desc: The ticket marks issues with the bundled Webinterfaces.

name: installation wizard
desc: This label indicates an issue with an installation wizard script.

name: build tools
desc: This label indicates a problem with one of our build tools or our build toolchain in general.

name: component related
desc: There is an issue with a bundled component.

name: bug
desc: An issue describing unexpected or malicious behaviour of the software.

name: documentation
desc: If an issue involves creating or refining documentation, this label will be assigned.

name: registry out-of-sync
desc: This label indicates that an entry in one of the installer registries is no longer up to date or is no longer updated by a crawler.

name: feature
desc: Feature requests and ideas, about how to make the software better, will have this label.

name: registry
desc: This label indicates a problem with related to data entries in the installer registries.

name: updater
desc: This label indicates an issue with the Updater.

name: support
desc: Questions that needs answering but do not require code changes or issues that only require a one time action on the server will have this label. See the documentation about our triage process for more information.

name: security
desc: This label indicates a security issue.

name: verify bug
desc: Before the label bug is attached to an issue, the bug needs to be reproduced.

name: easy pick
desc: This label marks tickets that are easy to get started with. The ticket should be ideal for beginners to dive into the code base.

name: configuration
desc: This label marks a configuration issue.

name: bounty
desc: This labels marks tickets with compensation for implementing a feature or reporting and closing a bug.

name: blocker
desc: The ticket cannot be resolved until some other ticket has been closed. See the ticketâ€™s log for which ticket is blocking this ticket.

name: api
desc: Tickets that require changes of API services.

name: installer registries (next version)
desc: Ticket related to software components in the installer registries of the upcoming, next version.

name: in progress
desc: This label marks tickets, that are not complete yet, but worked upon.

name: ready
desc: This label marks feature tickets, which contain enough information to start the implementation.

name: version crawler
desc: This label indicates a problem with one of our version crawlers.

name: duplicate
desc: The issue was reported before.
